summary: "Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga" (2024) is an action film directed by George Miller, focusing on the character Furiosa, played by Anya Taylor-Joy. It's the fifth film in the Mad Max series but the first without main character Max. The story happens before the events of "Mad Max: Fury Road" and tells Furiosa's origin story, from being kidnapped by a warlord to becoming a powerful leader. The film was in development for years due to salary disagreements with the studio. It premiered at the Cannes Film Festival and received good reviews, but it didn't make much money in theaters.
title: Furiosa A Mad Max Saga
